mapper.select: SELECT EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD /* 채널고객사 도시코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10), EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD_PK(P),SYS_C0011289(C) */ AND EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20), EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD_PK(P),SYS_C0011290(C) */ AND EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10), EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD_PK(P),SYS_C0011291(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD /* 채널고객사 도시코드 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CLIENT_CD AS clientCd /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD /* 채널고객사 도시코드 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD.CITY_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD SET /* 채널고객사 도시코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CNCLIENT_CITYCD /* 채널고객사 도시코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND CLIENT_CD = #{clientCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 고객사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
